thread.title: Medium plans to launch a consumer subscription product this year | TechCrunch
thread.title_full: Medium plans to launch a consumer subscription product this year | TechCrunch

author: Josh Constine
title: Medium plans to launch a consumer subscription product this year | TechCrunch
text:
Medium plans to launch a consumer subscription product this year Posted Elon Musk says he’ll present objections to Trump’s immigration order at Friday advisory council meeting 
Medium CEO Ev Williams announced today at Upfront Summit that his company will launch a consumer subscription product, with the first version coming in 2017. This could help Medium make more money than it is from ads. Finding a strong revenue source is critical, since Medium had to lay off 50 staff , close its New York office, and announce a new direction last month. 
We’ll have more details shortly. 0
